Name: Strike the Head
Description: Score this immediately after an enemy fighter is slain by a friendly fighter if the target was a **leader** or the target's Health characteristic was equal to or greater than the attacker's.

Name: Branching Fate
Description: Score this immediately after you make an Attack roll that contained 3 or more dice if each result was a different symbol. If you are the **underdog**, the Attack roll can contain 2 or more dice instead.

Name: Perfect Strike
Description: Score this immediately after you make an Attack roll if all of the results were successes.

Name: Critical Effort
Description: Score this immediately after you make an Attack roll if any of the results was a :atCrit:.

Name: Get Stuck In
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's Attack if the target was in enemy territory.

Name: Strong Start
Description: Score this immediately after an enemy fighter is slain if that fighter was the first fighter slain this combat phase.

Name: Keep Choppin'
Description: Score this in an end phase if your warband Attacked 3 or more times this combat phase.

Name: Fields of Blood
Description: Score this in an end phase if 4 or more fighters are damaged and/or slain.

Name: Go All Out
Description: Score this in an end phase if 5 or more fighters have Move and/or Charge tokens.

Name: On the Edge
Description: Score this in an end phase if any enemy fighters are vulnerable.

Name: Denial
Description: Score this in an end phase if there are no enemy fighters in friendly territory.

Name: Annihilation
Description: Score this in an end phase if each enemy fighter is slain.

Name: Determined Effort
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after you pick a weapon as part of an Attack. That weapon has +1 Attack dice for that Attack. If you are the **underdog**, that weapon has +2 Attack dice for that Attack instead.

Name: Twist the Knife
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after you pick a melee weapon as part of an Attack. That weapon has **Grievous** for that Attack.

Name: Lure of Battle
Description: Pick 1 friendly fighter that is within 2 hexes of another fighter. Push the other fighter 1 hex closer to that friendly fighter.

Name: Sidestep
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Push that fighter 1 hex.

Name: Commanding Stride
Description: Push your **leader** up to 3 hexes. That push must end in a starting hex.

Name: Illusory Fighter
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Remove that fighter from the battlefield, and then place that fighter in an empty starting hex in friendly territory.

Name: Wings of War
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after you pick a fighter to Move. That fighter has +2 Move for that Move.

Name: Shields Up!
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Give that fighter a Guard token.

Name: Scream of Anger
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Inflict 2 damage on that fighter and then remove 1 of that fighter's Move or Charge tokens.

Name: Healing Potion
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Heal that fighter. If you are the **underdog**, you can roll a Save dice. On a :dfBlock: or :dfCrit:, heal that fighter again.

Name: Brawler
Description: This fighter cannot be Flanked or Surrounded.

Name: Hidden Aid
Description: Enemy fighters adjacent to this fighter are Flanked.

Name: Accurate
Description: :surge: **Strike True:** After you make an Attack roll for this fighter, you can immediately re-roll 1 Attack dice in that Attack roll.

Name: Great Strength
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have **Grievous**.

Name: Deadly Aim
Description: This fighter's weapons have **Ensnare**.

Name: Sharpened Points
Description: This fighter's weapons have **Cleave**.

Name: Duellist
Description: :surge: **Footwork:** Immediately after this fighter has Attacked, you can push this fighter 1 hex.

Name: Tough
Description: No more than 3 damage can be inflicted on this fighter in the same turn.

Name: Great Fortitude
Description: This fighter has +1 Health.

Name: Keen Eye
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have +1 Attack dice.

Name: Sally Forth
Description: Score this immediately after your opponent's Action step if a friendly fighter with any Charge tokens hold a treasure token in enemy territory.

Name: Stand Firm
Description: Score this immediately after your opponent's Action step if a friendly fighter with any Stagger tokens holds a treasure token in enemy territory.

Name: Step by Step
Description: Score this immediately after your opponent's Action step if a friendly fighter with any Move tokens holds a treasure token in enemy territory. If you are the **underdog**, that friendly fighter can have any Charge tokens instead.

Name: Unassailable
Description: Score this immediately after an enemy fighter's Attack if a friendly fighter holding a treasure token was the target of that Attack.

Name: Aggressive Defender
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's Attack if the attacker is holding a treasure token.

Name: Careful Advance
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter Moves if 2 or more friendly fighters that have Move tokens are in enemy territory.

Name: Hold Treasure Token 1 or 2
Description: Score this in an end phase if a friendly fighter holds treasure token 1 or 2.

Name: Hold Treasure Token 3 or 4
Description: Score this in an end phase if a friendly fighter holds treasure token 3 or 4.

Name: Hold Treasure Token 5
Description: Score this in an end phase if a friendly fighter holds treasure token 5.

Name: Slow Advance
Description: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds any treasure tokens in both neutral territory and enemy territory.

Name: Iron Grasp
Description: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds all of the treasure tokens in a friendly and/or enemy territory.

Name: Supremacy
Description: Score this in an end phase if 2 or more friendly fighters with a total Bounty characteristic of 3 or more hold treasure tokens.

Name: Switch Things Up
Description: Pick 2 treasure tokens. Swap the positions of those treasure tokens.

Name: Sidestep
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Push that fighter 1 hex.

Name: The Extra Mile
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after a friendly fighter Moves. Push that fighter 1 hex. That push must end on a feature token.

Name: Settle In
Description: Pick a friendly fighter on a feature token. Give that fighter a Guard token.

Name: Healing Potion
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Heal that fighter. If you are the **underdog**, you can roll a Save dice. On a :dfBlock: or :dfCrit:, heal that fighter again.

Name: Hidden Paths
Description: Pick a friendly fighter in an edge hex. Remove that fighter from the battlefield, and then place that fighter in a different empty edge hex. Then, give that fighter a Move token, unless you are the **underdog**.

Name: Confusion
Description: Pick 2 adjacent fighters. Remove those fighters from the battlefield and then place each in the hex the other was removed from.

Name: Hold the Line!
Description: Fighters cannot be driven back. This effect persists until the end of the next Action step.

Name: Shoulder Throw
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful Attack if the target is adjacent. Remove the target from the battlefield, and then place them in a different empty hex adjacent to the attacker.

Name: By the Numbers
Description: Draw a number of Power cards equal to the number of treasure tokens held by your warband.

Name: Stubborn to the End
Description: If this fighter is the target of an Attack, the attacker cannot use Overrun.

Name: Inviolate
Description: This fighter cannot be Flanked or Surrounded while they hold a treasure token.

Name: Great Speed
Description: This fighter has +1 Move.

Name: Sharp Reflexes
Description: This fighter has +1 Save, to a maximum of 2.

Name: Brute Momentum
Description: This fighter cannot be driven back while they have any Charge tokens.

Name: Agile
Description: :surge: **Deft:** After you make a Save roll for this fighter, you can immediately re-roll 1 Save dice in that Save roll.

Name: Duellist
Description: :surge: **Footwork:** Immediately after this fighter has Attacked, you can push this fighter 1 hex.

Name: Great Fortitude
Description: This fighter has +1 Health.

Name: Keen Eye
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have +1 Attack dice.

Name: Great Strength
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have **Grievous**.

Name: Broken Prospects
Description: Score this in an end phase if 3 or more different treasure tokens were Delved by your warband this battle round or if a treasure token held by an enemy fighter at the start of the battle round was Delved by your warband this battle round.

Name: Against the Odds
Description: Score this in an end phase if an odd-numbered treasure token was Delved by your warband this battle round.

Name: Lost in the Depths
Description: Score this in an end phase if no friendly fighters are adjacent and any friendly fighters are not slain.

Name: Desolate Homeland
Description: Score this in an end phase if there are 1 or fewer treasure tokens in friendly territory.

Name: Torn Landscape
Description: Score this in an end phase if there are 2 or fewer treasure tokens on the battlefield.

Name: Strip the Realm
Description: Score this in an end phase if there are no treasure tokens on the battlefield or if no enemy fighters hold any treasure tokens.

Name: Aggressive Claimant
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful Attack if the target was in neutral territory, or the target was holding a treasure token when you picked them to be the target of that Attack and is no longer holding that treasure token.

Name: Claim the Prize
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter Delves in enemy territory. If you are the **underdog**, that Delve can be in friendly territory instead.

Name: Delving for Wealth
Description: Score this immediately after your warband Delves for the third or subsequent time this combat phase.

Name: Share the Load
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter Moves, if that fighter and any other friendly fighters are each on feature tokens.

Name: Hostile Takeover
Description: Score this immediately after the second or subsequent Attack made by your warband that was not part of a Charge.

Name: Careful Survey
Description: Score this immediately after an Action step if there is a friendly fighter in each territory.

Name: Sidestep
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Push that fighter 1 hex.

Name: Prideful Duellist
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after a friendly fighter's Attack if the attacker is in enemy territory. Heal the attacker.

Name: Commanding Stride
Description: Push your **leader** up to 3 hexes. That push must end in a starting hex.

Name: Crumbling Mine
Description: Pick a treasure token that is not held. Flip that treasure token.

Name: Explosive Charges
Description: **Domain:** Friendly fighters have +1 Move while using Charge abilities. This effect persists until the end of the battle round or until another Domain card is played.

Name: Wary Delver
Description: Pick a friendly fighter with any Charge tokens. Give that fighter a Guard token.

Name: Brash Scout
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after you make an Attack roll for a fighter in enemy territory. Re-roll 1 dice in that Attack roll. If you are the **underdog**, you can re-roll each dice in that Attack roll instead.

Name: Sudden Blast
Description: Pick an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly fighter. Give that enemy fighter a Stagger token.

Name: Tunnelling Terror
Description: Pick a friendly fighter with no Move or Charge tokens. Remove that fighter from the battlefield, and then place that fighter in an empty stagger hex. Then, give that fighter a Charge token. If you are the **underdog**, you can give that fighter a Move token instead.

Name: Trapped Cache
Description: Pick an undamaged enemy fighter within 1 hex of a treasure token. Inflict 1 damage ok that fighter.

Name: Great Speed
Description: This fighter have +1 Move.

Name: Swift Step
Description: :surge: **Quick:** Immediately after this fighter has Charged, you can push this fighter 1 hex.

Name: Burrowing Strike
Description: **Melee Attack action** \n [:Hex: 2 - :atFury: 2 - :boom: 2] \n This weapon has +1 Attack dice while this fighter has any Stagger tokens or is on a feature token.

Name: Tough Enough
Description: While this fighter is in enemy territory, Save rolls for this fighter cannot be affected by **Cleave** and **Ensnare**.

Name: Canny Sapper
Description: :surge: **Sneaky:** Immediately after you play a Ploy in a Power step, you can remove this fighter from the battlefield. Place this fighter in an empty stagger hex or in an empty starting hex in friendly territory, and then discard this card.

Name: Impossibly Quick
Description: This fighter has +1 Save. \n Immediately discard this Upgrade after an enemy fighter's failed Attack if this fighter was the target.

Name: Linebreaker
Description: This fighter's weapons have **Brutal**.

Name: Excavating Blast
Description: **Ranged Attack action** \n [:Hex: 3 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1] \n This weapon has **Stagger** while this fighter is in enemy territory.

Name: Gloryseeker
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have **Grievous** if the target has a Health characteristic of 4 or more.

Name: Frenzy of Greed
Description: While this fighter is on a treasure token in enemy territory or is in a stagger hex, Save rolls for this fighter are not affected by **Cleave** and **Ensnare** and this fighter cannot be given Stagger tokens.

Name: Spread Havoc
Description: Score this in an end phase. Gain a number of Glory points equal to your Cataclysm value, to a maximum of 2.

Name: Hounds of War
Description: Score this in an end phase if 2 or more enemy fighters are slain and/or damaged and any of those fighters were slain in the preceding combat phase.

Name: Set Explosives
Description: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds 2 or more treasure tokens and holds all of the treasure tokens in any territories.

Name: Wreckers
Description: Score this in an end phase if the number of damaged and/or slain enemy fighters is greater than your Cataclysm value.

Name: Uneven Contest
Description: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds each odd-numbered treasure token.

Name: Loaded for Bear
Description: Score this in an end phase if any friendly fighters are each equipped with 3 or more Upgrades.

Name: Collateral Damage
Description: Score this immediately after you advance your Cataclysm tracker 1 step as a result of a friendly fighter being slain. If you are the **underdog**, score this after you advance your Cataclysm tracker 1 step for any reason instead.

Name: Too Close for Comfort
Description: Score this immediately after your opponent's Power step if each friendly fighter is within 2 hexes of any enemy fighters.

Name: Shocking Assault
Description: Score this immediately after your opponent's Action step if your warband holds all of the treasure tokens in neutral territory.

Name: Nowhere to Run
Description: Score this immediately after an Action step if all friendly fighters have Move and/or Charge tokens and there is a friendly fighter in each territory.

Name: The Perfect Cut
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful melee Attack if no result in the target's Save roll was a success.

Name: Overwhelming Force
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful melee Attack if the Attack roll contained 4 or more dice.

Name: Savage Blow
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after you pick a weapon as part of an Attack. Rolls of :atSup2: count as successes for that Attack.

Name: The End is Nigh
Description: **Domain:** After each Action step, the player whose turn it is rolls a number of Attack dice equal to their Cataclysm value, or 1 Attack dice if they have no such value. \n If the roll contains any :atFury: or :atCrit:, their opponent must discard a Power card. This effect persists until the end of the battle round, until another Domain card is played, or until you advance your Cataclysm tracker.

Name: Growing Concerns
Description: Enemy fighters have -X Move in the next Action step, where X is your Cataclysm value.

Name: Total Collapse
Description: Roll a number of Attack dice equal to your Cataclysm value. If the roll contains :atFury: or :atCrit:, pick a fighter. \n Inflict 1 damage on that fighter. If you picked a friendly fighter, you can inflict damage on that fighter up to your Cataclysm value instead.

Name: Violent Blast
Description: Pick a stagger hex. Push each fighter within 1 hex of that stagger hex 1 hex.

Name: Sunder the Realm
Description: Roll a number of Attack dice equal to your Cataclysm value for each fighter within 1 hex of neutral territory. \n If the roll contains any :atSmash: or :atCrit:, inflict 1 damage on that fighter.

Name: Raging Tremors
Description: Pick a number of enemy fighters up to your Cataclysm value. Give each of those fighters a Stagger token.

Name: Counter-charge
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after a friendly fighter is picked to be the target of an Attack. Pick another friendly fighter. Push that fighter up to 3 hexes. That push must end adjacent to the attacker.

Name: Do or Die
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Inspire that fighter. This effect persists for X Action steps where X is your Cataclysm value. After that effect ends, do not discard this card. Instead, Uninspire that fighter. That fighter cannot be Inspired again. This effect persists until the end of the game.

Name: Improvised Attack
Description:
Pick a friendly fighter. That fighter immediately Attacks with the following weapon, where X is your Cataclysm value. 
 **Ranged Attack action** 
 [:Hex: 3 - :atSmash: X - :boom: 1] 
 This weapon cannot be modified.

Name: Bringer of Doom
Description: **Tick Tock:** After this card is discarded during a Combat Phase, you can immediately advance your Cataclysm tracker 1 step.

Name: Visions of Ruin
Description: This fighter has +X Move, where X is your cataclysm value. \n Immediately after this fighter Moves, give this fighter a Stagger token.

Name: Extinction's Edge
Description: :surge: **Ever Closer:** Immediately advance your Cataclysm tracker 1 step after an enemy fighter is slain by this fighter. Then, if your Cataclysm value is 2 or greater, discard this card.

Name: Driven by Pain
Description: :surge: **Insensate:** Immediately after this fighter is driven back, you can heal this fighter.

Name: Inescapable Grasp
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have **Ensnare**.

Name: Utter Conviction
Description: This fighter's Save characteristic is X, where X is your Cataclysm value, and cannot be modified further. This fighter cannot use critical weapon abilities.

Name: Burnt Out
Description: :core: **Smoulder:** Pick a friendly fighter. Give that fighter a Stagger token. Then, draw 2 Power cards. If you are the **underdog**, draw 3 Power cards instead.

Name: Great Fortitude
Description: This fighter has +1 Health.

Name: Hurled Weapon
Description: **Ranged Attack action** \n [:Hex: 3 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1 -(:atCrit: **Cleave**)-]

Name: Desperate Rage
Description: **Melee Attack action** \n [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 3] \n Immediately after this fighter has Attacked with this weapon, inflict 1 damage on this fighter.

Name: Aim for the Top
Description: Score this in an end phase if the total Bounty characteristic of slain and/or damaged enemy fighters is 4 or more.

Name: Arena Mortis
Description: Score this in an end phase if all fighters in the same territory have Charge tokens and their total Bounty characteristic is 4 or more.

Name: Best Foot Forward
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful Attack if that fighter has any Charge tokens and is in enemy territory.

Name: Bloodbathed Rampager
Description: Score this in an end phase if a friendly fighter has 2 or more Charge tokens.

Name: Bloody Momentum
Description: Score this in an end phase if 2 or more friendly fighters with a total Bounty characteristic of 4 or more have Charge tokens and are in enemy territory.

Name: Frenzied Rush
Description: Score this immediately after an Action step if friendly fighters with a total Bounty characteristic of 3 or more have Charge tokens and are in enemy territory.

Name: Living Bludgeon
Description: Score this immediately after an Action step if a friendly fighter has a Guard token and a Charge token and is not in friendly territory.

Name: Red Aftermath
Description: Score this in an end phase if the total Bounty characteristic of slain enemy fighters is 2 or more.

Name: Sally Forth
Description: Score this immediately after your opponent's Action step if a friendly fighter with any Charge tokens holds a treasure token in enemy territory.

Name: Savage Sprinter
Description: Score this immediately after an Action step if a friendly fighter in enemy territory has 2 or more Move tokens.

Name: Unrelenting Massacre
Description: Score this in an end phase if all fighters have Charge tokens.

Name: Vicious Brawl
Description: Score this immediately after an Action step if there are 3 or more fighters with Charge tokens adjacent to each other. If you are the **underdog**, there can be 2 or more fighters instead.

Name: Braced
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Give that fighter a Charge token.

Name: Catch Weapon
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after a fighter's successful Attack. Give that fighter a Charge token.

Name: Diving In
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Push that fighter up to 2 hexes. That push must end adjacent to any fighters with Charge tokens.

Name: Get It Done
Description: Pick 2 friendly fighters. Remove a Charge token from 1 of those fighters and then give the other fighter a Charge token.

Name: Lost Legacy
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after you discard a slain friendly fighter's Upgrades. Pick 1 of those Upgrades, put it in your hand then draw 1 Power card.

Name: Outburst
Description: Pick a friendly fighter with any Charge tokens. Roll an Attack dice for each enemy fighter adjacent to them. If you are the **underdog**, roll a number of dice equal to the battle round number instead. If the roll contains any :atSmash:, inflict 1 damage on that fighter.

Name: Over to You
Description: :surge: Play this immediately before removing a slain friendly fighter's tokens if that fighter was slain by an attacker and had any Move, Charge, Guard and/or Stagger tokens. Pick a friendly fighter or the attacker. Give the fighter you picked all of the slain fighter's Move, Charge, Guard and Stagger tokens.

Name: Push Through
Description: Pick a friendly fighter with a Bounty characteristic of 2 or less. Inflict 1 damage on that fighter. In your next Action step, that fighter can use Core abilities as if they did not have any Move or Charge tokens.

Name: Quick Shift
Description: Pick a friendly fighter that has any Move tokens. Remove 1 of that fighter's Move tokens and then give that fighter a Charge token.

Name: Reckless Attitudes
Description: Enemy fighters cannot use Core abilities other than the Charge ability in the next Action step.

Name: Bellowing Tyrant
Description: :core: **Bellow:** This fighter can use this Core ability if they have any Charge tokens. Push each other friendly fighter with any Charge tokens up to 2 hexes. Then, pick 1 of those fighters. Remove 1 of that fighter's Charge tokens.

Name: Bladecatcher
Description: While this fighter is the target of an Attack, the attacker cannot use Weapon abilities.

Name: Blades of Wrath
Description: If this fighter is slain, before removing them from the battlefield, roll a number of Attack dice equal to the battle round number for each enemy fighter adjacent to them. If the roll contains any :atSmash:, inflict 1 damage on that fighter.

Name: Furious Might
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have **Grievous** while this fighter has any Charge tokens and is not using the Charge ability.

Name: Fury of Aqshy
Description: Fighters adjacent to this fighter cannot use Core abilities other than the Charge ability.

Name: Headcase
Description: If this fighter has no Charge tokens, instead of playing a Power card in a Power step, you can give this fighter a Charge token.

Name: Headlong Charge
Description: This fighter has +2 Move while using the Charge ability.

Name: Keen Eye
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have +1 Attack dice.

Name: Still Swinging
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have **Ensnare** while this fighter has any Charge tokens and is not using the Charge ability.

Name: Utter Ignorance
Description: If this fighter would be slain, they are not slain. Remove damage tokens from this fighter until they are vulnerable and then discard this card.

Name: Alone in the Dark
Description: Score this in an end phase if no fighters are adjacent.

Name: Bloody and Bruised
Description: Score this immediately after your warband inflicts damage on an enemy fighter if 3 or more fighters are damaged.

Name: Careful Advance
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter Moves if 2 or more friendly fighters that have Move tokens are in enemy territory.

Name: Living on the Edge
Description: Score this in an end phase if a vulnerable friendly fighter is in enemy territory.

Name: Low on Options
Description: Score this immediately after you discard a Power card if 5 or more Ploy cards are in your Power discard pile.

Name: Out of the Frying Pan
Description: Score this in an end phase if 3 or more damaged friendly fighters that have Move and/or Charge tokens are in enemy territory.

Name: Ploymaster
Description: Score this in an end phase if you played 3 or more Ploys this battle round.

Name: Predictable End
Description: Score this immediately after an ability on a friendly Wrack and Ruin card inflicts damage on an enemy fighter holding a treasure token.

Name: Spread Out!
Description: Score this in an end phase if there is a friendly fighter in each territory.

Name: Stay Close
Description: Score this in an end phase if there are no fighters in edge hexes.

Name: Strong Start
Description: Score this immediately after an enemy fighter is slain if that fighter was the first fighter slain this combat phase.

Name: Unsafe Ground
Description: Score this immediately after your warband inflicts damage on an enemy fighter in an edge hex. If you are the **underdog**, that enemy fighter can be within 1 hex of an edge hex instead.

Name: Confusion
Description: Pick 2 adjacent fighters. Remove those fighters from the battlefield and then place each in the hex the other was removed from.

Name: Damned if you Do
Description: Your opponent must pick 1 of the following abilities for you to resolve: \n Pick an enemy fighter. Push that fighter 1 hex. \n Pick an enemy fighter that is not vulnerable. Inflict 1 damage on that fighter.

Name: Deadly Traps
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after a friendly fighter's drawn Attack if the target is not vulnerable and was driven back. Inflict 1 damage on the target.

Name: Fault Lines
Description: Pick an undamaged enemy fighter. Inflict 1 damage on that fighter. Then, your opponent can pick a fighter. Inflict 1 damage on that fighter.

Name: Fireproof
Description: The first time damage is inflicted on a friendly fighter in the next turn, reduce that damage to 1.

Name: Flee!
Description: Pick a friendly fighter in friendly territory. That fighter has +3 Move in your next Action step. If that fighter Moves in that Action step, that Move cannot end in friendly territory.

Name: Ominous Rumbling
Description: Your opponent must pick 1 of the following abilities for you to resolve: \n Pick 2 enemy fighters. Give each of those fighters a Stagger token. \n Pick an enemy fighter that is not vulnerable. Inflict 1 damage on that fighter.

Name: Sidle Up
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Push that fighter up to 2 hexes. That push must end adjacent to 2 or more fighters.

Name: Vicious Intent
Description: :surge: Play this immediately after you pick a melee weapon as part of an Attack. That weapon has +1 Attack dice for that Attack. If the target is undamaged, that weapon has +2 Attack dice for that Attack instead.

Name: Volcanic Eruption
Description: Pick a fighter. Then your opponent can pick an enemy fighter. Starting with the fighter you picked, roll a number of Attack dice for each of those fighters equal to their Bounty characteristic, to a minimum of 1. If the roll contains any :atSmash:, inflict 1 damage on that fighter.

Name: Barge
Description: :core: **Barge:** This fighter can use this Core ability if they have no Move and/or Charge tokens. This fighter Moves. That Move must end adjacent to an enemy fighter. Give this fighter a Charge token. Then, pick an enemy fighter adjacent to this fighter. Push that fighter 1 hex then give them a Stagger token.

Name: Desperate Defence
Description: While this fighter is the target of an Attack, the attacker's weapons have -1 Damage. The next time damage is inflicted on this fighter as part on an Attack, discard this card.

Name: Fiery Temper
Description: :surge: **Belligerent:** Immediately after this fighter has been picked to be pushed, you can inflict 1 damage on this fighter. If you do so, this fighter is not pushed.

Name: Great Speed
Description: This fighter has +1 Move.

Name: Henchman
Description: :surge: **Disciplined:** Immediately after you make an Attack roll for this fighter, you can change 1 result to :atSup1:. You cannot re-roll Attack rolls for this fighter.

Name: Misfortune
Description: :surge: **Ill-fated:** Immediately after this fighter uses a Core ability, you can inflict 1 damage on this fighter. Then, you can remove this Upgrade from this fighter and equip another friendly fighter with this Upgrade.

Name: Rock-splitting Tread
Description: :surge: **Stomp:** Immediately after your last Action step in a battle round, pick an adjacent enemy fighter that is not vulnerable. Inflict 1 damage on that fighter. Then, roll an Attack dice. On an :atSmash:, discard this card.

Name: Sundering Weapon
Description: This fighter's melee weapons have **Cleave**.

Name: Unstoppable
Description: While this fighter is vulnerable, each time 1 damage is inflicted on this fighter, reduce that damage to 0.

Name: Wary Tread
Description: You can use this ability after the last Power step in a battle round. Push this fighter 1 hex. That push cannot end adjacent to any fighters.

Name: Aggressive Defender
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's Attack if the attacker is holding a treasure token.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: All In
Description: Score this in an end phase if there are no tempered friendly fighters in friendly territory and any tempered friendly fighters are in neutral and/or enemy territory.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Behind Enemy Lines
Description: Score this immediately after an opponent's Action step if a tempered friendly fighter holds a feature token in enemy territory.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Calm Before the Storm
Description: Score this in an end phase if there are any damaged fighters and those fighters are not adjacent.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Double Team
Description: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful Attack if the target was Flanked by a friendly fighter.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Immovable
Description: Score this immediately after an opponent's Action step if a friendly fighter was the target of an Attack in that Action step while they were tempered and the target was not slain.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Power in Numbers
Description: Score this immediately after an Action step if 3 or more tempered fighters with no Move tokens are adjacent. If you are the **underdog** score this if 2 or more tempered fighters with no Move tokens are adjacent instead.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Risky Position
Description: Score this in an end phase if a tempered friendly fighter is in enemy territory.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Sneak Into Position
Description: Score this immediately after an opponent's Action step if 2 or more tempered friendly fighters are adjacent to the same enemy fighter.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Trial of the Tempered
Description: Score this in an end phase if each fighter is tempered.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Two-pronged Assault
Description: Score this in an end phase if 2 or more tempered friendly fighters are in enemy territory.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Usurper
Description: Score this in an end phase if an enemy **leader** was slain by a tempered friendly fighter this battle round.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Death Throes
Description: Pick a tempered friendly fighter. In the next Action step, Attacks that target this fighter have -2 Attack dice.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Fake Out!
Description: Pick an enemy fighter with a Health characteristic of 3 or more that is adjacent to a tempered friendly fighter, and then roll an Attack dice. If the roll contains any :atSmash: or :atFury:, inflict 1 damage on that fighter, and then give that fighter a stagger token. If you are the **underdog**, the roll can also contain :atCrit:.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Final Stand
Description: In the next Action step, tempered friendly fighters cannot be pushed.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Opportunity Strikes
Description: Play this immediately after you pick a weapon as part of an Attack for a tempered friendly fighter. That weapon had +1 Attack dice for that Attack.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Power from Death
Description: Play this immediately after a friendly fighter with a bounty of 1 or more is slain by an enemy fighter, if that fighter was tempered before inflicting the damage that would slay them. Draw up to 3 Power cards.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Running Riot
Description: Play this immediately after a tempered friendly fighter's successful Attack. Pick another friendly fighter. That fighter is tempered.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Sidestep
Description: Pick a friendly fighter. Push that fighter 1 hex.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Spiteful Traps
Description: Pick an enemy fighter with a Health characteristic of 3 or more within 2 hexes of your **leader**. Give that fighter a Move token.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Synchronised Effort
Description: Pick 2 tempered friendly fighters within 4 hexes of each other. Remove those fighters from the battlefield and then place each in the hex the other was removed from.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: The Uprising!
Description: All friendly fighters are tempered in the next Action step.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Dark Horse
Description: This fighter is tempered.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Deadly Aim
Description: This fighter's weapons have **Ensnare**.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Fuelled by Pain
Description: **Melee Attack action** \n [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: X - :boom: 2 -(:atCrit: **Ensnare**)-] \n X is equal to the number of damage tokens this fighter has.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Great Fortitude
Description: This fighter has +1 Health.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Impervious
Description: While this fighter is tempered, Save rolls for this fighter cannot be affected by **Cleave** and **Ensnare**.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Lash Out
Description: **Thrash:** Immediately after this fighter is slain, before removing them from the battlefield, roll a number of Save dice equal to the battle round. For each :dfBlock:, give an enemy fighter within 2 hexes of this fighter a Move token.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Mobbed!
Description: When this fighter Attacks, if the target is within 3 hexes of any other friendly fighters, the target is Flanked and Surrounded for that Attack.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Parting Shot
Description: :surge: **Pyrrhic Strike:** Immediately after this fighter is slain by an enemy fighter, before removing them from the battlefield, pick an enemy fighter within 2 hexes of them. Give that fighter a stagger token. If this fighter was tempered before inflicting the damage that would slay them, inflict 1 damage on that fighter.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Pesky Nuisance
Description: Enemy fighters adjacent to this fighter must target this fighter with any Attacks.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck

Name: Sharpened Points
Description: This fighter's weapons have **Cleave**.
Deck: Edge of the Knife Rivals Deck
